org.joty.workstation.web

Class WebClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.joty.web.AbstractWebClient
      • org.joty.workstation.web.WebClient

  • public class WebClient
extends org.joty.web.AbstractWebClient
    Instantiates a org.joty.workstation.web.WebConn and makes a concrete implementation of its ancestor for the Joty workstation application.
    See Also:
    AbstractWebClient

                                            java.lang.String lang)
        Gets a ConfigFile from the server.
        Parameters:
        type - possible values are {conf, confX, jotyLang, appLang}
        lang - the language identifier in the case type gets the values {jotyLang, appLang}
        Returns:
        ConfigFile object

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.Object manager)
        Drives the framework to operate through the Accessor object for querying the database about authentication data. The method, at the latest stage, invokes the sqlQuery method when the static member Common.m_webSessionOn is false: this produces the Joty 'login' command to the server.
        Specified by:
        login in class org.joty.web.AbstractWebClient
        Returns:
        true on success
        See Also:
        Accessor, Application.openAccessorWResultSet(String), WResultSet, sqlQuery(String, boolean), Common.m_webSessionOn
